SEARCH
Package org.GameObjects

Class Punishment

java.lang.Object
org.GameObjects.ImmovableObject
org.GameObjects.Punishment
public class Punishment extends ImmovableObject
Entity encoding information on game punishments: lava tiles which cause the player to lose points and return to the starting position when touched.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class org.GameObjects.ImmovableObject

    collidableArea, collidableAreaDefaultX, collidableAreaDefaultY, collision, image, name, timeSinceSpawned, xPos, yPos

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Punishment(int xPos, int yPos)
    Initialize this punishment to a given x and y position, as well as initializing all its variables and loading its image file.

    • Punishment

      public Punishment(int xPos, int yPos)
      Initialize this punishment to a given x and y position, as well as initializing all its variables and loading its image file.
